synopsis.text:
Now here in the bustling, coastal metropolis of Donghai City does fresh water flow freely, leaving its citizens constantly parched. Amidst this arid backdrop, Li Yunxiang, a passionate motorcycle enthusiast, ekes out a living as a diligent deliveryman. Content with his modest existence, Yunxiang's life takes an unexpected turn when a fateful collision with the privileged son of the city's water supply company awakens the dormant power of the ancient Chinese deity Nezha within him.

As he grapples with his newfound abilities, Yunxiang finds himself entangled in a web of vengeance and conspiracy. With the city's most influential figures now gunning for him, he must harness the power of Nezha to safeguard not only himself but also those dear to him. In order to restore tranquility to his beloved hometown, Yunxiang must confront his past, unravel a sinister plot, and rediscover the strength that lies within.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
